Rare.title: As far as I am concerned
Rare.lyrics:
[
Rare - As far as I am concerned

In the night
I feel how big this world is
when everything becomes quiet,
when everything reaches peace,
everything becomes nothing,
when sun rests on this side,
but I'm still awake
cuz I know it's still there,
only teasing me til another day

Relate to sky dare the night
clouds become stars

As far as I am concerned
it may last forever

Pieces can be broken in some smaller parts
but if u don't care
everything's gonna be alright

world wide
day side
let's take my pride for a ride
take a walk on the westside

just cruisin'
mind freakin'
is there any more that I should be
seekin' for

As far as I am concerned
it may last forever

Still remember
lyin' in a bed
after our first gentle ride
in a tender love that grew from inside
you watched me as I first took side
reversed my mind
knew you'll always be there

to hear me out
to be my lady
to be my lady

As far as I am concerned
it may last forever


I'll take another stop
in my soulmate's sanctuary
for another cup of conversation

Small walk in De Niro's footsteps
then again lying in his bed of past

Having Marley in my every dream,
seein' his path,
sharing his faith

As far as I am concerned
it may last forever

Now I see what's going down
what runs through me
with a golden wish to finally
be created

Now I see what says to me
that everything's gonna be alright..

As far as I am concerned
it may last forever

As far as Rare is concerned..
..everything's gonna be alright..

- hvala ganja

Rare.title: Blacksun rising
Rare.lyrics:
[
Rare - Blacksun rising

Off goes the bird
I called her color of wish
to find a new world
cuz this one admits the mistake
of sailing in wrong direction
I can face you now

So I envy and I'm still learnin
I feel the flow now goes right through me
Always a strange moment, the special moment
off spittin it out, of laying the sight
go from my eyes and through you
if your slow and dumb
Checkin it out
Let's get the boothie's moving fine
Head was coolin it down

Blaze my crown
and if I sat that I'm a king,
fuckin martin luther king
against the crime of ignorance
Rasism hole
Every small being has it's role in all it's perfect

I see my blacksun rising
to give me my shelter
I see my blacksun rising
to emerge my anger
Like a mighty moses
Like a mighty messiah
I see my blacksun rising
and I'm back in a flow

Experiance myself that's the goal
that's the final meanin
that would give me time and sence
to create and relate
If some things hadn't happen
would I still be the same
would I grow of expectations
on where I was standing
Side to side it's up to me to decide
I got my honor and my rare pride
that I can rely on
Who can judge me
Who can judge all my way

Run out of childhood
but i will let the memories stay
Credence is proceeding
and I'm exposed to my freedom
Charming as usual
Life going right into my face
Said to pack up my kid funk
and got it ready to go

Stay high never crawl
embrace the new life role
Stay high never crawl
angels can wear my crown
Stay high never crawl
embrace the new life role
Designed as a blacksun back into flow!

I see my blacksun rising
to give me my shelter
I see my blackun rising
to emerge my anger
like a funkie moses l
ike a funkie messiah
I see my blacksun rising
and I'm in freestyle
I'm a freestyler..

- hvala ganja

Rare.title: Da li vidiš
Rare.lyrics:
[
Rare - Da li vidiš

Bolestan sam, ne mogu sa sobom da baratam
i sve što uradim rano kasno shvatam
nikog ne puštam u svoj svet uzmi me za ruku
da li sam spreman za let
ma nisam spreman za let

Faces covered when not wearing tha mask
a task of believin' is thrown into child's hands
that should be carrying only it's touch and the truth
that just needs to be said

Kaži šta ti treba koliko toga da bi se digao do neba
slušam te sad se sve sme a nema se
i sve je gore a ja bih želeo daleko

ovde je svet ili ništa možda negde preko
nije važno granica je blizu i da se ponekad vratim
i pogledam reprizu zaustavim krizu
jer sam morao da vidim život je težak zato neću da se stidim

A da li vidiš kaži da li vidiš
život je težak zato nemoj da se stidiš
nemoj da se stidiš

Koliko crnih dana i crnih noći
čovek na vrhu sveta u erupciji svoje moći
to je bolest koja mi navire u dušu
mami osmeh a hvata me za gušu
negativne vibracije propale generacije
koliko patnji i rušenja ove nacije
i situacije koje nisam prošao otkako sam rođen
a tu gde sam rođen tu je posađen orah
a sada miris ove zemlje toliko je gorakduga je bol u meni i moraće da stane
2008-u sanjao sam takve dane
a sad ih slušam kako lažu, stop sidi kažu

političari TV mislioci što na ulici drogu prodaju deci
a ja sam tu i dobro znam da sam tu jer nemam kud

ovo nije moj neighbourhood
ovo nije moj neighbourhood

A da li vidiš kaži da li vidiš
život je težak zato nemoj da se stidiš
nemoj da se stidiš

- hvala ganja

Rare.title: Fathers day
Rare.lyrics:
[
Rare - Fathers day

My girlfriend's pa is now long gone
I wonder if she's still alone
Her mom is really tryin'
to stop the soul from cryin'
Can she take it all the way,
not to stop or be afraid;
to fill the hole of sadness,
embrace the bliss of madness
Paper boats of gray are floating
but the river's hard for holding on
Can she really take it,
or should she try to fake it
Memories keep living on,
is it worth to give it all

Drink the booze of living tears
break the air in pieces

You could say I'm daring the sun
but I'm calling from the top

Corner shop not far away
like my friend's pa likes to say
Always thought he'd stay the same
the picture changed and not the frame
Paint the sea across your walls
but the waves are strong they take it all

Alcohol dares for another round
but what goes around now comes around
Some careless things went through his life
but the price is high may drag him down

this ain't no glory ride
he's off to see the otherside
there's no way you'd be prepared
just show him true how much you cared
his blood and pride are what you are

I need you now don't go so far

You could say I'm daring the sun
but I'm calling from the top

Your sweet hands turned cold
I may be blind but this I can see
the tattoos were in me are in me
all the way

You could say I'm daring the sun
but I'm calling

Please take me..

need you now
don't go so far away
don't go so far away
need you now..

- hvala ganja

Rare.title: Ja sam taj koji čeka
Rare.lyrics:
[
Rare - Ja sam taj koji čeka

So go on
take another piece of my soul
roll within you say
pictures of clay
delay of hearts
and I'll keep waiting
searching for your happiness

..

Window's so big, it kinda opens the sky for me
The room is made of stone, but the stone is so cold
Girl you never knew who you run into,
but you felt the direction right from the start
Could you look through my eyes, shining light is so bright
and see the day for the first time resembling the night
I should smother my desire, emerge it from my sight,
cuz shattered's the one who's up against his own fire

All time leader in tender seduction
was facing the wall, stuck with some magic,
but there's a hole on a wall set by decision you made
enough for glance of my eyes, they're bringing no lies to you
Easily climbing highest mountains of paper
With you I'm always awake in a form of a child

I'd be a liar if I say I'll leave you to another
so I'll wait til your silence becomes more louder !!

Ja sam taj koji čeka čeka
ja sam taj koji čeka i čeka na tebe..

Loved to wake up beside you, few moments before you
to see the face of the soul that I was always looking for
Playin' it cool, but I could watch you forever
I found a river so pure that I never ever crossed before,
and it took me to an ocean, thousand dreams from a shore
So all that you've done left me ready for waiting
slightly leaning to a smile, I hear the past linger on

Ja sam taj koji čeka čeka
ja sam taj koji čeka i čeka na tebe..


Decision I made
division of signs
of where I used to be
of where I used to hide myself
just to keep being sane
who's to be called
when the walls are closing in on ya
my eyes are so small
compared to abundance of sense they're tryin' to meet
it's so easy to talk about a problem you had
when you managed to land on your feet

You're steppin' over my!

- hvala ganja

Rare.title: Prince of nowhere
Rare.lyrics:
[
Rare - Prince of nowhere

But I was there alone
knowing my purpose

But I was there alone
seein' my direction takes a turn

Before my eyes
Before my eyes

..

I thought that armor has no weakness
but the drops of rain of what can happen in life
soaked my body to the bone
and then slowly turned into ice

Things that I was sure about
now fade away,
they were blown away
like a cloud scared away
by the face of the sun

I placed my palms on the ground
covered with broken glass
of the space where I was
lying and waiting

I can't seem to find what's missin'
fill the hole my world is breaking down
clear to me is that I'm buildin'
a disguise of hatred to what I could become

The Prince Of Nowhere..

Painted canvas of love that I gave
were spinnin'
all around in my head
but I can't grab any moment

that passes right through me
on a wave and I miss it
all that birds are dressed in silence
as I walk on

forgotten feelings start to itch me
they've been pushed away for so long

endless sea's in my reach and I listen
it's so peaceful
whispers are becoming now more clearer
as I'm sailing round the cape of nowhere

I can't seem to find what's missin'
fill the hole my world is breaking down
clear to me is that I'm buildin'
a disguise before me to what I could become

I can't seem to find what's missin'
fill the hole my world is breaking down
clear to me is that I'm buildin'
a disguise before me made of hatred
o what I could become
fuckin' prince of nowhere

I kinda asked a fool to reveal the secret

the prince of nowhere
